name: White Dog
about: A lost white german shepard is found by a girl, but she doesn't know the dog was trained to attack black people.

name: Biccentennial Man
about: Based in Isaac Asimov story. Andrew is a special robot who wants to be like a human.

name: Blow Out
about: A movie sound expert who witnesses a car accident while recording sounds. After check his tape, he finds out that it was actually a murder.

name: Narrow Margin
about: A district attourney has to protect an homicide witness and hide her in a train while does not know who to trust.
